channel.title: [PI] Need help with cases please asap will rep++[pi 317]
channel.description:
I am trying to make items for my donator shop here is what i got:
Error: [code] src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:198: not a statement 15008: //zuriels ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:198: ';' expected 15008: //zuriels ^ statement 11720: ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:210: ';' expected 11720: ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:212: not a statement 11722: ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:212: ';' expected 11722: ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:214: not a statement 11694: ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:214: ';' expected 11694: ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:216: not a statement 11698: //sara gs ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:216: ';' expected 11698: //sara gs ^ I appreciate any help Thanks!

item.title: [PI] Need help with cases please asap will rep++[pi 317]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

bro… all these have to be case 15008:…

15008: //zuriels 15009: 15011: return 2; 15014: //morigans 15012: 15013: 15015:

Read full topic

item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“Tobbescape, post:1, topic:399427”]replace the : with ;
like:
case 6889:
replace with
case 6889;[/quote]
What the fuck you just said
